thread.title: Magisk Module to Enable PlayStation Remote Play on Unsupported Devices
thread.title_full: Magisk Module to Enable PlayStation Remote Play on Unsupported Devices

author: Mishaal Rahman
title: Magisk Module to Enable PlayStation Remote Play on Unsupported Devices
text: PlayStation Remote Play is a neat application that enables your mobile device to remotely access your PlayStation console to play games, but it’s only officially available for Sony devices. There have been a few unofficial ports available for quite some time, but if you’ve been having issues with the recent update to version 4.50, then check out this Magisk module by XDA Senior Member leolawliet who whipped this up quickly and confirmed it to work on his Nexus 5X running a custom Android 7.1.1 ROM.
